AquaINFRA Interaction Platform (AIP)

The AquaINFRA Interaction Platform (AIP) serves as the central gateway for scientific communities to find, access, and reuse aquatic digital resources.

Search Functionality

  • Usage: In the search bar, users can enter terms (e.g., ‚ÄúGulf of Riga‚Äù) to find relevant workflows, data, and tools.
  • Ontology Search: Categorizes results based on their semantic relationship to the search term, helping users explore related concepts.

Filtering Results

The platform offers robust filtering to narrow down resources:

1. By Data Provider

Filter resources from specific trusted providers, including:

  • INSPIRE
  • Arctic Data Center
  • Copernicus Marine
  • HELCOM
  • EMODnet

2. By Spatial Coverage

An Interactive Map allows for spatial filtering:

  • Select specific European Catchment Areas.
  • Draw a Custom Bounding Box directly on the map to find data within a specific region of interest.
